pages.text: The chimera familiar can be fed (any) meat to grow, when growing it will gain damage and speed. Once it has grown big enough, players can ride it. When feeding it a golden apple the goat will detach and become a separate familiar.
The detached goat familiar can be used to obtain the $(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_shub_niggurath)Shub Niggurath$(/l) familiar.
When upgraded by a blacksmith familiar, the goat familiar it will get a warning bell. When you hit the familiar it will ring the bell and attract enemies in a large radius.
